SELECT hotNewsLine,hotNewsTitle, COUNT(*) AS total_count,-- 计算每个 hotNewsTitle 的总数 SUM( CASE WHEN hotNewsLabel < - 0.8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS n_count,-- 计算 hotNewsLabel 小于 -0.8 的记录数 SUM( CASE WHEN hotNewsLabel >= - 0.8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS p_count,-- 计算 hotNewsLabel 大于等于 -0.8 的记录数 ROUND(( SUM( CASE WHEN hotNewsLabel < - 0.8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)), 2 ) AS p_percentage,-- 计算并四舍五入保留两位小数的占比 ROUND(( SUM( CASE WHEN hotNewsLabel >= - 0.8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)), 2 ) AS n_percentage -- 计算并四舍五入保留两位小数的占比
FROM hotsearch where isDisabled = 0 GROUP BY hotNewsTitle
